thread.title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks Baseball Lovers & Fans
thread.title_full: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Baseball Lovers & Fans

author: prbuzz.com
title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks Baseball Lovers & Fans
text:
Los Angeles, CA (PRBuzz) October 20, 2015 -- WatchBuddy® Timepieces - one of the nation’s finest makers of Theme Watches and Wall Clocks ( www.lovableproducts.com ) -- proudly announces the release of a collection of Watches and Clocks targeting Baseball Lovers and Fans! They are great for Christmas and Hanukah gifts!
Each of these finely crafted precision timepieces is graced with a beautiful dial picture of Baseball Players (Batters, Pitchers, Fielders, Catchers), or Iconic Image such as Bat and Ball, Glove or Mitt and Ball.
Thus WatchBuddy® Timepieces magically transform watches & clocks from mere timepieces into delightful and joyful Objects of Delight for Baseball Lovers & Fans!
For further information about the WatchBuddy® - Baseball Watches and Clocks please visit: www.lovableproducts.com (the search tool in the right upper hand corner is very helpful - use keywords: Baseball Watch )or Clock) and the specific Players (Batters, Pitchers, Fielders, Catchers), or Iconic Image such as Bat and Ball, Glove or Mitt and Ball.
WatchBuddy Watch and Clocks are also featured on many major online shopping venues such as Amazon.com. Most noteworthy is that WatchBuddy’s Store - All Lovable Products by WatchBuddy – is one of the highest rated seller’s on Amazon.com based on Customer Satisfaction Ratings and Customer Service Metrics.
_ _ _ _
About WatchBuddy® Brand Products:
WatchBuddy® is a registered trademark brand of watches, jewelry and fashion accessories held by GreatMerchants.com, Inc., a large group of web based and brick & mortar businesses bringing unique, innovative and creative products and services to consumers.
